genreQ.question: Let's start with broad strokes. Pick The scenario that sounds most fun to you.

rpg.option: Staring at a character creation menu for 45 minutes until you give up and go with the default option, then rolling the same glass cannon you always do.

drillDowns.question: So you like role playing, eh? Well, what type of role playing sounds best to you?

tacticalRPG.option: I like overlooking a battlefield and controlling a squad of hitters, each doing what they do best. What they do best is dictated by me, of course.

actionRPG.option: I like to click, and loot. Click to attack, click to loot. Maybe press an ability button here or there, but you get the idea.

jRPGS.option: I like anime, but in video games.

roguelikes.option: I like to die. A lot. I like getting super attached to a character, only to watch them die. Over and over again.

openworldRPG.option: I like setting out from the starting area, exploring an endless landscape and living my life how I want t- Wait, you're telling me I'm the chosen one? Me, out of all these NPCs out here?

strategy.option: Leading a squad, army or nation to victory over its enemies while ignoring the problematic nature of waging large scale wars for fun.

drillDowns.question: More of the tactical type, huh? Well, what kind of tactics do you prefer?

4X.option: I like to eXplore a map, eXpand to dominate that map, eXploit the resources available and eXterminate everything that isn't me.

moba.option: Ok. So there's three lanes, and everyone controls what's called a 'champion', or 'legend'...

rts.option: No turns for me. I like facing off against an opponent, each of us controlling huge armies concurrently. Whoever kills the other's base first, wins. gg no re scrub

tactical.option: I like to plan out squad movements methodically, only to reload an autosave from 30 minutes ago because my best unit just got FREAKING HEADSHOT FROM ACROSS THE MAP

grandStrategy.option: I like pretending I'm the ruler of an entire nation, waging a war for dominance, survival...and sweet, sweet border expansion.

action.option: Using perfect movement, precise timing and unmatched accuracy to dominate a game.

drillDowns.question: An action junkie, are you? Alright, what kind of action do you prefer?

platformer.option: I like falling into a bottomless pit right before the end of the level, then missing the first jump six times in a row.

shooter.option: I like battling through wave after wave of deadly enemies, chugging Energy Drink TM and clicking heads until everything around me lies dead or dying.

fighting.option: Hitting combos is my thing. Doesn't matter if its 2D or 3D. My favorite thing to do is learn complex button combinations to perform five-second attack animations.

battleRoyale.option: I wanna be the last person standing in the middle of a deadly circle. No, my escape from that circle isn't explained. Stop asking so many questions.

simulation.option: Meticulously planning every aspect of your world like an all-powerful deity with severe control issues.

drillDowns.question: Hmmm, you like simulators, do you? Which simulation appeals most to you?

sports.option: I like playing sports, but on a screen in my house. Instead of outside, with real people.

management.option: I like managing large scale projects, but I didn't go to school to be a city manager so I just play video games instead.

racing.option: I like going the distance. Going for speed. She's all alone (all alone) in her time of need. (I like racing games)

flight.option: I wanna fly planes and spaceships. That's it. No special requirements. Just give me a plane or a spaceship, and I'll fly that thing for hours.

lifeSim.option: I want to live another life. Take video games to their furthest extent, and they're just simulations of the real world. I have no way of knowing whether my in-game character is self-aware. And they'd have no way of knowing that I exist. What if we're the sims? Who's playing our game?

adventure.option: Getting the rush of discovery from exploring a new area that you had to look at the wiki to figure out how to get to.

drillDowns.question: Ahh the adventuring type... Let's see what kind of adventurer you really are.

metroidvania.option: I want most of the game to be unreachable until I collect certain items. Also platforming. Lots of platforming.

survivalHorror.option: I enjoy being scared out of my mind. It's a hobby. That feeling you get when you think something's following you? Take that and condense it into a video game.

stealth.option: I habitually avoid conflict because confrontation frightens me. I'd rather sneak around my problems.

survival.option: I want to explore and find resources so I can keep filling constantly depleting bars. If I run out of food, I die. No water? Dead. Too tired, too bad. Deceased.

settingQ.question: If you had to pick one, what kind of game world would you want to run around in?

fantasy.option: Just give me another Middle Earth clone please.

sci-fi.option: If it has aliens, spaceships or time travel, I'm in.

historical.option: I enjoy feeling like I'm in history class when playing video games.

post-apocalyptic.option: I'm the kind of person who thinks the end of the world would be really fun to live in.

none.option: I'm not partial, I'll play any setting.

playerQ.question: Are you a social animal, or a lone wolf?

mmo.option: Oh I'm social alright. MASSIVELY social.

cooperative.option: I like people, but only if we're working together.

singleplayer.option: I'm the only gamer I know who's good enough to play with me.

multiplayer.option: The only time I enjoy games is when I'm enjoying them at the expense of others.

none.option: Doesn't matter to me, I'm just glad to be here!
